points.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations
The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
You can opt out of targeted advertising
This service does not sell your personal data
This service can share your personal information to third parties
This service allows tracking via third-party cookies for purposes including targeted advertising.
The copyright license maintained by the service over user data and/or content is broader than necessary.
This service requires first-party cookies, which are cookies that only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.
points.status: The Privacy Policy states, "Technologies such as: cookies, beacons, tags and scripts are used by the Website and our partners, affiliates, or analytics or service providers. These technologies are used in analyzing trends, administering the Website, tracking users’ movements around the Website and to gather demographic information about our user base as a whole."

points.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service
Service does not allow alternative accounts
This service retains rights to your content even after you stop using your account
points.status: The Terms of Use state that the licenses you grant to Course Hero for your submissions are "royalty-free (except for any payments or credits we expressly agree to pay to you when you make your Submission), perpetual, transferable, sublicensable, irrevocable, and worldwide." Here, "irrevocable" means they can still use it.

points.title: This service can license user content to third parties
points.status: The Terms of Service state, "You agree that the licenses you grant are royalty-free (except for any payments or credits we expressly agree to pay to you when you make your Submission), perpetual, transferable, sublicensable, irrevocable, and worldwide." The terms "transferable, sublicensable" mean that Courser Hero can license user content to third parties.

points.title: You waive your right to a class action.
The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.
The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data
The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
points.status: The Privacy Policy states, "Technologies such as: cookies, beacons, tags and scripts are used by the Website and our partners, affiliates, or analytics or service providers."

points.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age
The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
points.status: The Terms of Use state, "We reserve the right to change the Terms at any time, but if we do, we will bring it to your attention by placing a notice on the www.coursehero.com website, by sending you an email and/or by some other means . . . Except for changes by us as described here, no other amendment or modification of these Terms will be effective unless in writing and signed by both you and us."

points.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
This service holds onto content that you've deleted
points.status: The Terms of Use state, "You understand and agree that if you delete your account, it may not be possible to completely delete that content from Course Hero’s records, and that your Submissions will remain viewable elsewhere as part of the Services and to the extent that they were downloaded or stored by other Users."

points.title: This service cannot be held responsible for disputes that you may have with other users
This service uses third-party cookies for statistics
points.status: The Privacy Policy states, "Technologies such as: cookies, beacons, tags and scripts are used by the Website and our partners, affiliates, or analytics or service providers. These technologies are used in analyzing trends, administering the Website, tracking users’ movements around the Website and to gather demographic information about our user base as a whole. We may receive reports based on the use of these technologies by these companies on an individual as well as aggregated basis. "

points.title: Users cannot scrape the website of the service
points.status: The Terms of Use state, "You represent, warrant, and agree that you will not contribute any Submission that, or otherwise use the Services or interact with the Services in a manner that . . . "Crawls," "scrapes," or "spiders" any page, data or portion of or relating to the Services or Content (through use of manual or automated means)."

points.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
points.status: The Privacy Policy states, "We may also disclose your personal information . . . if Course Hero is involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of its assets, you will be notified via email and/or a prominent notice on our Website of any change in ownership."

points.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
points.status: Cookie policy: "Because of our use of Cookies, our Services do not support Do Not Track requests at this time."

points.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
points.status: Privacy policy: "Alternatively, you can opt-out of receiving marketing communications either through your account settings or by contacting us (see Contact Us section below). "

points.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
points.status: Cookie policy: "Course Hero Companies and our third-party providers, including those who provide website statistics on the use of our Services and those who provide interest-based advertising services, use cookies and similar technologies such as pixel tags, web beacons, clear GIFs and JavaScript (collectively, “Cookies”) for a variety of purposes."

points.title: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of your data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period
points.status: Privacy policy "We may further retain information indefinitely in a de-identified, anonymous or aggregated form where that information would not identify you personally, as described in the policy and permitted under applicable privacy laws."

points.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
points.status: Privacy policy: "We may create aggregated, de-identified or anonymized data from the personal data we collect, including by removing information that makes the data personally identifiable to a particular user."
